Conversation.Response: Why thankyou for your efforts. As a reward have 25 bug coins.
Last time that I saw Yimo, she was heading off on some type of quest.. She wouldn't tell me much more.
Oh you found Yimo! Please bring her back when you can. We miss her.

Question.txt: Could you get me a bag of berries off Yakk the trader. I don’t have enough berries here for my berry pie.

Conversation.Response: Thank you so much. I will reward you for your help.
Thank you so much for getting those berries for me. I'm just collecting some blueberries now and should be able to finish the pie.
Thank you so much for rescuiing Yimo. This tribe is forever grateful for your help.
Before I tell you when I saw her last go and get a bag of berries from Yakk the trader. I don’t have enough berries here for my berry pie.
Oh, Yimo is gone again. Hehe. Yimo thinks she is an explorer. Always coming back with strange stories.
Why thank you! Keep it though, I don't particularly need that.
